posts.title: Nightlight Secrets: Progress report of March 2025
posts.intro: Here are the progress report of March 2025 concerning Nightlight Secrets. Read the post to learn more about the current state of the game!

posts.title: Starbit Light 2.0 + some updates!
posts.intro: After 5 years of using the same logo, Starbit Light is going into a visual refresh! Along side this change, we have a few updates!

posts.title: Finally announcing the rebranding...
posts.intro: After years of waiting to announce this to you, it is finally time. Click to view the new game's branding and what will also change!

posts.title: Temporary Extra Beat removal.
posts.intro: Extra Beat has been temporarily removed from Google Play and will return in the future!

posts.title: Scrapping Unity for all of our game projects.
posts.intro: Due to all recent changes and concerns with Unity's runtime fees, we decided to completely switch to another game engine!

posts.title: A note about our team and our projects.
posts.intro: Check out this message about the Starbit Light team, the progress of Nightlight Secrets and all our other projects.
